website_summaries.verdict: Highly rated for being gorgeous and sturdy, these are a top pick that runs a little narrow.
pros: These boots stand out with their high quality leather and soft inner lining
Women praise the versatile look that makes them an excellent everyday boot – they have a strong, durable design
cons: Those with wide feet may want to choose a different style, as these tend to run a little narrow
Colors may look different in person

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality/possibly counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: Either these are counterfeit, or Frye isn't as great as I thought it was. I lean toward the former. The packaging looked legit until I pulled the cardboard from the boots - the printing (pictured) looks SUPER fake. The seams are messy with glue, the label has a bunch of extra thread sewn on, and the craftsmanship is generally poor. The leather does seem real, and the metal rings are, well, metal. But I can't really believe that boots with such poor craftsmanship would really sell for what Frye charges at full price. I'm going to stick to the Frye website from now on since Amazon doesn't seem to be able to control the flow of counterfeit goods.
customer_reviews.author: S.R.E.

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with The Harness
customer_reviews.text: I have been eyeing these boots for years! I got these in vintage chocolate color and they are the most beautiful boots I've ever put on my feet. I did get a half size smaller, as suggested in reviews and they fit well in my toe and heel. However they are quite tight in the width. These are my 2nd pair of Fryes and I had to wear big thick socks with my first pair to break them in. I will do that for these as well. This version of the Harness has a wider calf than others I've tried on, which is good in my case. A beautiful, classic boot that goes with everything and can be worn anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: And I find myself struggling to break in a pair that are a half size bigger then my original pair that fit amazing the first day I wore them
customer_reviews.text: If you bought your original fryes over five years ago GO ONE SIZE UP! Myself and others have noticed their sizing has changed over the years, And I find myself struggling to break in a pair that are a half size bigger then my original pair that fit amazing the first day I wore them. I should have gone a full size up but I’m committed now and I love my original pair so much I’m hoping the pain and purchase of boot stretchers will be worth it this time round.
customer_reviews.author: C.Blue

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Great well made boots. The boot has no arch support and there is not enough place in the toe box to put in the inserts ( pretty typical for boots). However what works really well and fixes the issue is using the 1/2 shoe inserts ( heel and mid foot support ). They fit great and what a difference. The shoe becomes just awesome. Also the shoe can be easily stretched with shoe stretcher to accommodate wider foot. I always wanted this kind of boots but because the need for the orthothics insert was not able to find one. This one works.
customer_reviews.author: Dermgirlan

customer_reviews.title: Very wide
customer_reviews.text: Much wider than my last Frye boots that lasted decades. I bought the same size, 9. The length is perfect but the heel is unbelievably wide. I tried heel pads and they still slip so I ordered some thick socks. Hope that works as I really don't want to send them back. Also wanted them in black so I ordered Dingo as they tend to run narrow. Nothing wrong with the quality but they did arrive with a scratch and dry leather. Rubbed in Frye creme and that took care of the scratch and leather.
customer_reviews.author: DJCTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: What did I even buy?!
customer_reviews.text: These boots looked nothing like the picture...I understand leather has natural cracks and blemishes but these boots were so discolored that they looked practically greenish yellow. There are random layers of what seems to be a strange waxy substance over the boot with it being so thick on the upper back of the right boot that you can scrape it off with your fingernails. I’m not normally someone who posts reviews but my jaw dropped when I opened these. It’s hard to describe exactly what I got so I’ve uploaded some pictures for reference. Needless to say these are going back ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Schmalhofer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: returned the shoes. Cannot get solestop to respond to request for refund status. They received the boots back over a week ago and I’ve not received a refund yet. I understand things are moving a bit slower with current events, but to not respond and not refund after receiving the product back is shady. These are tighter in the calves than expected. Also disappointed that they came with a scuff on the toe and were dusty. I’m not sure they’re real unfortunately. They are however, very comfortable. I even considered keeping them despite not being what I expected but am sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Kiuki

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for my problem feet.
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. They are quality made in the USA. I normally wear a size 8, and ordered half size down to 7.5. I was a little afraid it would be too small, but there is still ample room for my wide feet and long Morton toe. I wore them around the home on carpet first to make sure they would work for me. My feet tend to hurt in many shoes and I normally wear sneakers all the time, no heels, no sandals, no flats. These were very comfortable the first time I wore them out. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for wearing with just about anything
customer_reviews.text: These boots are a little hard to pull on at first, but adjust well after wearing a couple of times. I typically wear a 9.5, and have a wide foot. The 9.5 in these is fine on width, and slightly long in the tie. It’s possible I could wear a 9 in these, but I don’t want to chance them being too small. As it is, I have enough room to wiggle me toes, and the fit is comfortable. The top of the boot comes to just below the widest part of my calf, and the boots look great with jeans and dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Sams

customer_reviews.title: No go for the silver/multi
customer_reviews.text: My review is for the silver/multi color. I have a Frye bag and wallet in the same finish and I love them. These boots were not the same looking leather at all. They looked like suede that had been spray painted silver. In the picture you can see the purse vs. the boots, the color and texture difference is substantial. The leather smelled good, though. I had to return them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jack White's guacamole recipe

customer_reviews.title: Frye does not mean what it used to.
customer_reviews.text: Wrong size received . I wear size 11M was sent size “5M”. The leather looked as if the boots were previously worn. Very disappointed. I have purchased 7 pairs of booths from Frye over 10 year period. But this tops the cake. The quality workmanship is gone. The American heritage in The classic Frye standard has gone to Asia.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love. Again
customer_reviews.text: These boots are B.O.M.B. I had another pair I hung onto as long as I possibly could because I was so attached to them. Three heel/sole replacements later, I finally invested in a new pair which look and feel amazing right out of the box. Timeless. Priceless. I am in love. Again.
customer_reviews.author: Roningirl

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresentation
customer_reviews.text: I selected black at checkout but the boots that arrived were black WITH silver glitter all over them. Really, it looked like someone was spray painting some rusty yard art chrome with their black Frye boots on :| Not cute, very disco rodeo clown. I ordered a half size up per review recommendation, and they are huge! Scuffed up too. Returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: The name sells itself...nothing but quality!!
customer_reviews.text: If you’ve ever owned these boots you know how amazing they are! I bought them as a gift for my niece who wasn’t sure if she should wear them to the barn. These can be worn anywhere they are built to last!!! I bought a used pair 6 years ago and they are going strong! Don’t be sticker shocked...they are worth every penny! They last forever!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Verseatile, durable, cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Added a Dr. Scholls insert, as I noticed my knees were hurting from the impact of walking. After breaking them in they are my favorite. I just bought leather cleaner because the winter has mucked them up a bit. Haven't yet worn on the motorcycle, but I am sure they will hold up well. These go with everything and look so rad. They have stretched, but my right foot seems to be bigger than the left so it takes a bit more wiggling to get that sucker in.
customer_reviews.author: Chel D

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Boots, long toe box
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely gorgeous boots! unfortunately,I just did not like the length of the toe box. The leather is distressed silver,and very soft. The boots were comfortable,and fit true to size. I just felt they were too long,and not flattering for me. Quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie Sander

customer_reviews.title: Love the boots
customer_reviews.text: Fits as I'd expected. Normally take an 8 but I'd tried these boots on in a store and found I was more comfortable in a 8.5 so I new what I needed. Excellent company and very happy I finally was able to afford these boots. I like the Charcoal color as it's dark enough that it will go will with my black chaps but has a different look than the mundane black! Since I live in Iowa I can't comment on how well the tread will work for motorcycle riding! I will definitely get a good idea come spring!
customer_reviews.author: Yaskjustdo

customer_reviews.title: Great boot - read reviews to make sue they are right for you
customer_reviews.text: These books are beautiful. As other reviews say you should order a size down as they run large. They are also quite heavy (1.8 pounds each) - which is good for a motorcycle boot, but a bit heavy for everyday (at least for me). I didn't have trouble getting them on or off, but i have a narrow foot. I also have a narrow heal, and due to the heaviness of the boot I found my heal lifting our of the boot - which caused me to ultimately return the boots. I hope this review helps people, because these boots are awesome if you can get the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon LA

customer_reviews.title: Great boots but not for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these boot. They look amazing on other ladies I've seen with them. They looked wonderful in the box. But on me, they did not look so amazing. I think that I am looking for something a little more feminine. These were a bit bulkier than I would have hoped for. I love Frye boots and will keep searching for the perfect pair of black Frye boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amber BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Frye Women's Harness boots
customer_reviews.text: These are great looking boots. I wear 9 1/2 shoes. Because of the reviews I decided to order the 9's. The length was fine. I have Plantar Fasciitis so I used inserts. I read reviews where people who wore medium width had to have the boots stretched. I thought since I wear a AA width they would work fine for me. I could hardly get my foot in the boot. They are VERY narrow. Since I have feet issues anyway I didn't want to pay the price for the boots, try to have them stretched and they still not fit properly so I decided to return them. Disappointing because I loved the looks of them and they looked well made.
customer_reviews.author: dlh

customer_reviews.title: If between sizes definitely size down
customer_reviews.text: Have a few pairs of Frye's (Harness and a zip up moto) and I forgot that they can run slightly large. The cognac has strong orange tones so if you're hoping your boots are eyecatching, these are. By no means garish or "too orange" but the hues are there. These were authentic 12R Harness Frye boots and excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: A classic
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a pair of these boots and when Amazon offered them as a Deal of the Day, I jumped at the chance to purchase them. They are pretty much everything I'd hope they'd be. The fit is comfortable, even for my problem feet. The leather is of good quality and the workmanship is unsurpassed. I have friends who have Fryes that are over 20 years old and still look great. I hope that will be the case with my pair. So far, they've held up wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Susang

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love My Frye Boots!
customer_reviews.text: These Harness 12R Frye boots are everything I'd hoped for when I placed the order. I love the distressed or aged charcoal color; from toes to calf, they fit perfectly, and they were one of Amazon's daily specials, so the price was incredible. They arrived within a couple days, and I had to pick them up at the counter of my little rural PO, where I promptly opened the box so me, neighbor and Postmistress alike could ooooh and aaaah over my Fryes! Thanks Amazon for the great special offer, and thanks Frye for maintaining the quality of your footwear over the years. Aleea
customer_reviews.author: MsHarmonyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best Boot Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I received these yesterday and they are perfect in size and the leather is beautiful! I used the water proof spray and yes it darkened them, but to a good thing, It made the leather darker and more beautiful than it already was. These boots fit me like a glove, and I can't wait for the weather to cool so I can wear them every single day. South Dakota winters are cold and relentless and these boots are going to stand up to the test. I got them when they were marked down and so happy i did!
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: Received the Wrong Boot in the Right Box
customer_reviews.text: Sadly while I ordered the 12R in an 11M, I received the 8R in a size 9.5M. So disappointing! The mixed black color is a bit more glitzy than I might have cared for, so if anything, here is a photo of it out of the box for those curious. Hopefully they'll get it sorted out in the warehouse so the next person doesn't get the wrong size and style of boot.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Stunning boots with superior quality leather
customer_reviews.text: Stunning boots with superior quality leather, however they run very large. I had to reorder a new pair that were a full size smaller than what I typically need. Timeless look, just make sure to compensate when ordering these and select a size smaller than you would normally buy, trust me and save yourself some trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Face_The_Facts

customer_reviews.title: My New Prize Possession
customer_reviews.text: I have coveted these iconic boots forever but really couldn't justify the price. I nearly soiled my undergarments when I saw what a great sale price Amazon had for these and JUMPED on them. Now I wish I had pulled the trigger long ago. The caramel color is gorgeous; 3 season perfection. Generous calf width, I don't consider my calves toned at all, and they don't have to be to fit in these. I drift between sizes 8.5 and 9 depending on the shoe and the maker. I found the 8.5 perfect in these.
customer_reviews.author: Walnut2

customer_reviews.title: Girl with size 10+ feet? Get the men's size...
customer_reviews.text: FRYE, I love your boots, but your women's line is totally stupid. I have to buy the mens shoes because your womens shoes are FAR too narrow and you don't even manufacture my size. Also the soles aren't as thick as the mens. Why are you making the women's boots possibly LESS durable and charging the same price? I know you are trying to make a feminine shape in your boot but you are catering to small dainty feet and leaving out the bigger girls.
customer_reviews.author: Linguini

customer_reviews.title: Frye Boots
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with these as soon as I opened the box. The color is a deep brown. Too bad I couldn't even get my foot inside, despite reading several reviews that said they were true to size. I exchanged for a size 8 and they are still not the easiest to put on and take off. Once on, the 8s are a bit narrow in the instep but feel comfortable. The left boot feels snug compared to the right and the right heel is loose. I wore them around the house for a couple hours and they seemed to be pretty comfortable. Hopefully they will be just as comfy when I wear them out and about.
customer_reviews.author: TerryS

customer_reviews.title: These boots are not full black
customer_reviews.text: These boots had a little too much silver on them for my taste. Too bad because I love Frye boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kitsunefoxglove

customer_reviews.title: Amazon, please restock in 9.5!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have trusted the reviews for this boot about sizing. A solid size 10, I ordered a size 10 and my foot was swimming in the boot despite wearing a 10 in other styles of Frye's I have tried on. The quality of leather and finish is simply gorgeous, the footbed comfortable but not as cushioned as an Ecco or Clarks. A classic. But I have been waiting to exchange my too large shoe for a proper 9.5 for a few weeks now without Amazon restocking- what's the deal?
customer_reviews.author: beecave

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, will last forever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. My only complaint is that they are a bit wide at the middle for my feet and I haven't found a sock with the thickness to accommodate this while not squeezing my toes yet. Currently, I use compression socks to make up for the awkward extra space. Regardless, I'll find the right sock to fit the boot width. I would recommend these boots to any woman wanting a long lasting, comfortable, good-looking pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Litwins

customer_reviews.title: Too much silver paint on an otherwise awesome boot
customer_reviews.text: The silver metallic paint was WAY WAY WAY heavier and weirder looking than in the picture. But it’s a great, solid boot that fits beautifully. I’ll have to figure out how to get rid of the weird silver paint.
customer_reviews.author: KBP

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous boots, but too big for my legs
customer_reviews.text: These were beautiful boots and I loved the lower part of the boot: the square toe, harness, heel, everything! But sadly I returned them because the shaft looked rather absurdly huge on my apparently scrawny calves. I could only wear them over jeans or skinny jeans but not under as they stuck out. Leggings or dresses were out of the question because these just looked enormous on my legs! If it helps anyone I wear a 6.5 and have 12.5 inch calves. I have a pair of frye taylor boots that fit my calves wonderfully. Awesome boots, just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bama

customer_reviews.title: Love These Boots - I Get Compliments on Them Every Time I Wear Them
customer_reviews.text: So I had my eye on these boots for a few years, but never purchased due to the high price point. Finally I thought to myself, I still want them years later, I should just buy them, so I did! I bought them about a year and a half ago, and I just love them. The finish is great, not shiney. The leather is high quality. I can't say I'd want to walk a mile in them...but they're comfortable as far as boots are concerned. I really do get a ton of compliments on these boots. They have a rugged yet feminine look. I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Giving Back

customer_reviews.title: love my Fryes
customer_reviews.text: They're a Frye product, so my expectations were high, and they were met. Very sturdy leather, thick neoprene soles, will need some breaking in but will last a lifetime. The charcoal color is great, a nice subtle alternative to black. I've seen other reviewers mention an olive color, which I would definitely be interested in as well. I am a narrow size 9-91/2, and these allow room for one pair of heavy socks or two pairs of thin ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Delahunt

customer_reviews.title: Coolest boots I own. And I have LOTS of boots.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are truly badass. The height is perfect, the weight is perfect, and the quality is impeccable. The leather is nice and thick and the charcoal color has a kinda distressed look, which makes them look lived in. They are pricey but totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Waldrip

customer_reviews.title: cool and classic
customer_reviews.text: I'd been wanting the Frye harness boot for a long time and finally went for it. I was prepared to order a half size down since I've often heard that they run large. Before ordering on Amazon, I tried them on at a department store, and the size 8 (my regular size) fit the best. The 7-1/2 felt too narrow (and I have narrow feet, mind you) and was rubbing my ankle slightly. I was bummed because my feet are already so huge I was looking forward to getting a smaller size for once. But I opted for the 8. Excellent construction and they look really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Piggles

customer_reviews.title: Color not as pictured - fit issues.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in Smoke because I've always wanted to try a pair of Frye boots. They were more brown than "smoke" colored, in my opinion. The boots looked different online. Also, I wear an 8. I ordered up a size to 8.5 - the back harness strap is so tight on the boots that I received that my heel can't possibly slide down into the boot. I tried my daughter, a size 6, and she couldn't get her heel past the back strap either. It needs to give another 1/2" +/- to make these boots physically possible to even get on a foot. Maybe it's just the pair I received? In any case, I'm bummed they did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Anna L.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME boots, way more comfy than expected
customer_reviews.text: I adore these boots, they are so comfortable that the gel inserts I bought for them just got returned because they don't need them. The grey is a perfect addition to my closet, and matches with almost everything while not being the same old boring black (don't get me wrong, I LOVE black boots, but I can't justify yet another black pair!) and I've gotten several compliments on them. I usually wear a 8.5 or 9, but this boot fit me best in an 9.5.
customer_reviews.author: lawdragon

customer_reviews.title: Not like the picture and not good on muscular legs
customer_reviews.text: A lot more silver overspray than shown in the picture. The silver also rubs off. I try them and the size is good but the stuff and a bit hard to get on. Likely better after breaking it in. The height also hits mid calf. I have muscular calves but it made my legs look stumpy.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money and trust your gut in sizing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these boots! I was wary about the sizing because of other reviews but my sizes vary between 6-7.5 depending on the brand (6.5 is usually good all around for me)so I went with the size I have in other boots in which is 6.5B. When I got them they were actually kinda tight not too much but enough to make me pause and a bit loose in the heel but after wearing them to break them in they fit very comfortably and they look great too. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Black Multi  not really black
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd hit the jackpot for black Frye's under $200! Turns out black multi is really a silver metallic black Returned and put towards the more expensive Black 001 and these are the boots of a lifetime :) If the price is too good to be true, don't trust it unless you like off colors or metallics :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort meets Shine!
customer_reviews.text: Love love these boots! The color is great and goes with everything. I took advice on ordering a half size down. Glad I did. I always wear size 9. 8.5 fit great with a little bit of room to spare. Very comfortable and love the style. I have a medium width foot. I will cherish these boots forever.
customer_reviews.author: Farrah Rivera

customer_reviews.title: I love love love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these boots! Wear to the barn, ride horses, to town on errands, brush them off and wear em to church. They do run small but that allows me to wear big cushy socks for my poor arthritic toes. Solid boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Webb

customer_reviews.title: Frye boots don't disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: Frye boots don't disappoint! These are the good quality boots that I have become used to.
customer_reviews.author: Kitten's Boy's Miss

customer_reviews.title: Beauties!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful leather -- sort of a greyish dark brown (no reds or copper in the brown). I have slightly narrow feet and because these come to a sort of squared off pointed toe, my foot slides forward a little more into that pointed toe than a wider foot would. So while I normally wear a 6.5 in other Frye boots, in this model, 6.5 is a little long for me.
customer_reviews.author: Solar Sue

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't fit.
customer_reviews.text: These boots were both too large and too small. I wear a 6.5 and ordered a 6.5. The shoe fit was too large and the calf too small. I'm petite (maybe that's the problem?) and athletic (a problem too?) so maybe that messed up the sizing but I don't usually have problems purchasing boots. Glad that I have Prime so that I can return them at no charge. I've wanted to get a pair for years and the quality was amazing but sadly they have to go back.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: The boots are gorgeous, but they run a little big. Great boots for a great price. Frye is the best thus far!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Love These Boots
customer_reviews.text: They fit exactly to size on me. Originally, based on previous reviews, I ordered an 8.5. I needed the 9. The return process was smooth and I got my refund more quickly than I thought I would. Upon re-oredering I splurged on one day shipping and got it exactly on time. They are a little tough to get on the first couple of times. With new leather that is to be expected. Once I got them on they are very comfortable. I went out for an evening just after putting them on for the first time and I never once had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Davis

customer_reviews.title: Narrow shaft, seemed like a second :(
customer_reviews.text: Boot shaft extremely narrow! Should have returned!! I can get on with the help of a long shoe horn, and they feel fine. Just wish I had shopped a bit more and purchased at a reputable retailer.
customer_reviews.author: KimT

customer_reviews.title: HOORAY FRYE!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an 8 (in all heels, sneakers, etc). I went to a department store and found a similar style of Frye boot to try on for size purposes. I ended up ordering a 7.5 and they fit PERFECT! I also found that these were priced over $100 less than others just due to color. The color is great, so to pay under $200 for boots that are normally well over $300 I am thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: KnucklecakesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong style - got 15R
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Received a replacement pair and they are perfect. Correct height, matching distressing. These came in a labeled Frye box. Gave 4 stars because of the hassle of returning crummy, mislabeled first pair. I received the Harness 15R instead of the Harness 12R. It came in a nondescript box (not a Frye box) and there was no label depicting size and style. One boot was significantly more distressed than the other. However, boots were comfortable and I loved the color. Sent back for replacement and I hope I get the right style and that they match each other better.
customer_reviews.author: K8

customer_reviews.title: Great boots and good shipping
customer_reviews.text: Have wanted these boots in this color for a while. Can no longer find them in my size at Frye. I was afraid the 7.5 would be tight but they are loose, so perfect with socks. I am glad I didn't size up.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Duran

customer_reviews.title: READ ME
customer_reviews.text: Due to all the different reviews I really debated about what size to order. I decided on my usual size, 7. Just got them today and they fit pretty well. I'm going to need to break them in, but that was expected. Some people were saying they run big, but the style of boot is supposed to slip in the heal slightly at first. Also, they are pretty narrow so unless you have very thin feet they'll be too tight if you go a size down! Over all great purchase! They are super cute and although I haven't broke them in yet, I can see the quality of the boot makes it worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boots
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these boots. They take some time to break in, but once that deal is over, they fit so well. The sole is very heavy, and I actually like hearing my boot hit the ground as I'm walking. They're very stylish with jeans or a dress (if you could pull that off). The leather is strong, and I've worn them in the rain once or twice (I try not to) with no soaking. I wish all boots were made with such high quality.
customer_reviews.author: StrongCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Frye is a tremendous boot maker. I bought the ...
customer_reviews.text: Frye is a tremendous boot maker. I bought the size I usually wear, the leather is stiff and will stretch and adjust with wear. This is customary in my experience. I don't think I would have been able to get my foot in a smaller size. I did end up purchasing a boot jack for easier removal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived early and just perfect except a bit too big - makes them slippery ...
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance and purchased these lovely boots even though they were a size 5.5. That was they smallest size offered. I usually wear 4.5 - 5.0 in shoes. Arrived early and just perfect except a bit too big - makes them slippery to walk in. I found a size 5 at Nordstroms!! Returned above boots as they really were too big.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Gave them the boot and got the boot elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: i bought this boot and the picture did not display appropriately the boot that was in the box. They were a men’s boot and the shoe box look like it had been returned more than once. I bought the boot elsewhere and I am loving the boot
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Luckily the seller has a easy exchange policy
customer_reviews.text: I ended up having to order these twice, unfortunately. Luckily the seller has a easy exchange policy. The first pair I ordered were absolutely beautiful and fit perfectly, unfortunately there was a rip along the top seam. After exchanging for a new pair, everything was fine. I've had them a little over a month so far and the boots are still in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutlely love these boots.
customer_reviews.text: These boots were comfortable right out of the box. Rubber soles keep them from being dangerously slippery. I get positive comments from strangers every time I wear them out. They make a statement. Look great with skinny jeans worn inside the boots and a tunic. Can't wait to go out western dancing in them. They look very well made. I hope to still be wearing them 10 years from now.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Texas

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Boot- but half size too large
customer_reviews.text: I love this boot, and wear it with thick socks, because it is large all over. I am an exact 9.5 in almost all other shoes I have ever worn, sometimes a 10. Not these. I have wondered if it is only this size or this color or the particular day it was made, but I would have liked to try a size 9. If the sizing is consistent, I bet the 9 would fit better. My boot really is a half size too large.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: The boots I've always wanted
customer_reviews.text: These harness boots are really rustic. The leather has a lot of variation and graining. Be forewarned; the color isn't dark brown, it's more a golden color. I don't mind that, but you might. My foot is barely an 8 and I have room for a thin sole insert and winter socks. I am also calvy, but these boots go over them ok. It's still summer where I live, so I am looking forward to the fall weather when I can pull these on all the time. They are comfortable and will only get more so as they break in. I plan to wear them with jeans and skirts. A bit of biker chic for a wonderful price!
customer_reviews.author: Zina S

customer_reviews.title: Nice but tight
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to live these but I just couldn't. They were very nice boots and fit to size. However, the top of the book was snug on my calves and I wouldn't say I have big calves or anything. The color of the "tan" was a nice brown. Overall, I ended up sending these back. Maybe they would have loosened at the top but I wasn't going to see considering the pice I payed for them.
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: Vancouver bc
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice quality looking boot Im a true 9 and i ordered a nine but i could have ordered An 8 1/2 but was not going to send them Back its to expensive i put some arch Supports in them and there great ,there Hot boots ,wish these were around when i 20 Was young
customer_reviews.author: tay

customer_reviews.title: Was worried about size they definetly run on the big ...
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about size they definetly run on the big side also my calves are 16” shaft was a little tight but sure I’ll be able to stretch them a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Cloudmtn

customer_reviews.title: Love These Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I tried two other pairs of Frye boots, before buying these and finally getting it right! This is the perfect boot and for a great price too! It did run large on me. I could easily have gone a 1/2 down, when I never, ever do. Next pair that I get, I'll remember that, however, it will probably be when I get them in black, as these are likely to last for years.
customer_reviews.author: P. Stancil

customer_reviews.title: badass boots
customer_reviews.text: love these badass boots. flattering mid calf height. comfortably relaxed fit but not too loose. i wear a 6 to 6.5 and the 6.5 is perfect with or without socks. thick quality leather. made in usa. classic style. i hope i can wear them forever.
customer_reviews.author: Cutter

customer_reviews.title: great boots
customer_reviews.text: these are great boots, made in the USA! Very comfortable and awesome. I am exchanging mine because the right foot is noticeably larger than the left- I'm hoping they will be perfect when they come again- that is why they have 4 starts not 5. Other than that- I have these in a size 7 for the past 10 years and have loved them- but with three pregnancies my feet have grown and they are such nice boots I have ordered them again- my old ones have held up to everything and still look great!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots!
customer_reviews.text: Got these originally in size 9, but they were a just big enough to annoy me with the heel slip, so I exchanged them for an 8.5. They fit PERFECTLY and don't even require breaking in! They are the most comfortable boots I've ever had and look good with everything! I have received many compliments on them and look forward to wearing them all winter.
customer_reviews.author: Chel

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome! I put my padded heel inserts in because ...
customer_reviews.text: Oooh yeah! They are awesome! I put my padded heel inserts in because cowboy boots have heel slippage that is normal for them. I do not have slender calves and these will be fine with break-in. My foot can be slightly wide, and these are fine. The color is awesome - authentic looking. These are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: S. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Boot
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots. I have a higher arch than most so I added an insole to the boot. (I do this with all my closed shoes.) Still fits great. Harness is a simple yet rugged style for everyday or working on our property. I would by another pair in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Tyre

customer_reviews.title: True American-Made Quality
customer_reviews.text: I wear mostly size 9, sometimes 8.5, and I wear an 8.5 in these boots. They break in quite nicely; what felt a tiny bit narrow when I first put them on is now a great fit after a week of wearing and no blisters or anything like that. Right out of the gate I took them to Elko, NV and danced in them all weekend and my feet are happy! Beautiful, sturdy, and extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THESE BOOTS SELL IN MY AREA FOR TWICE WHAT I JUST PAID. I HAD A HARD TIME BELIEVING THE PRICE AND WAS VERY LEARY ABOUT WHAT I WAS GETTING. THEY ARE THE TOP OF THE FRYE LINE....THE WORKMANSHIP IS SO BEAUTIFUL AND THE QUALITY IS AMAZING. I COULD NEVER WEAR THESE OUT.....I'D HAVE TO PUT THEM IN MY WILL! I WHOLE-HEARTEDLY RECOMMEND THEM!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy of Mo'chanicsville

customer_reviews.title: Had to return due to width
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually 8.5. Have slightly wide fee. I had to return the 8.5. Was too tight it width in the toe box. Decided to buy a 9 instead. 9 is a little big, but at least fit in width. Heel slips a little, but I guess that's normal? These boots are beautiful. Stunning to look at. I can't wait until winter hits and I can wear again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot. Narrow fit.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boot. Good quality and style. Length was good but it was too narrow. They need to also offer them in a wide fit.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly!
customer_reviews.text: These take a while to break in, but once they are, you will find them to be incredibly comfortable and stylish. The look is great with jeans and skirts and I always have a little swagger in my walk when I'm wearing them. Wore them for a very long day that culminated in an evening concert (with the requisite dancing during and partying after) and my feet were still happy at the end of the night.
customer_reviews.author: LAMB

customer_reviews.title: Think what you will wear with these wonderful boots; as they are funky but awesome non the less
customer_reviews.text: An old hippie with sparkle; that’s me love these boots
customer_reviews.author: chuck rodabaugh

customer_reviews.title: fit great. Received same size from Amazon and it fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried on boot in store, fit great. Received same size from Amazon and it fit much tighter. Will have to really break them in. Other than the fit it's a well constructed boot.
customer_reviews.author: mr.bill

customer_reviews.title: Just as I remember them
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing better than a Frye Harness boot. Boots that I wore as a kid forty years ago. They were quality made then and they are still quality made now. Made in America these boots are extremely well made and will last for decades with proper care. They have proper arch support that will keep your feet comfortable all day long. I would buy them again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Owl

customer_reviews.title: KNOCKOFFS
customer_reviews.text: These don't seem to be real Frye boots, I think they are knockoffs. The heel is weird, and the toebeds don't match. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: ms cleaver

customer_reviews.title: Best boots ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Frye boots. After much research and careful thought, I went with the Greasy Black Harness 12R and they could not be more perfect. I ordered my normal size, 8 1/2 and they are just right. I feel like the coolest person in the world wearing them and I know they will last for years. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: kellyminelly

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got these in navy and they are the bomb. They can be dressed up or down and look great with dresses or jeans. I read the other reviews and ordered my correct size because my feet are a little wide. I am glad I did - they fit very well. The heel slides a little but no blisters and if the boots stretch with wear I will get some heel grips. A great purchase - worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Philly

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One boot was taller than other. Suspect it may not be authentic! “Shoe Liquidator”
customer_reviews.author: DM145

customer_reviews.title: I AM IN LOVE!! When I got the boots I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: I AM IN LOVE!! When I got the boots I thought they were going to be too big, but they just needed to be broken in! After a couple of weeks wearing them they fit like a dream! I could wear them all day! By far the best boot I have ever bought! Well worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: Holly T.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful boots
customer_reviews.text: i was hesitant to buy boots i couldnt try on but i've been looking for boots and these are exactly what i wanted! so i placed the order, had the box delivered within the week and when i opened the box the smell of fresh clean leather boots overwhelmed me. tried them on and they fit perfect! i love these boots!! they are exactly what i was looking for and i know if i treat them and care for them properly they will last me forever. im very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: shellie angell

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots Ever
customer_reviews.text: This company does not fail to have the best product. I love them and they are so comfy too. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Newman

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a pair of these boots for a very long time. Bought these as a deal of the day and I am so glad I did it. Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Boots fit exactly how I thought they would. The charcoal color is gorgeous. Love the smell of leather as I opened the box. One of my best Amazon deals ever.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe76

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 81/2 wide shoe so I got the 9 in this boot and it fits great after wearing it in a bit. You will have to wear it in and let it form to your feel. I suggest doing this barefoot. I also suggest applying some coltsfoot oil to the entire boot to soften it up just a bit (this will darken the color though).
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Heavy boots!
customer_reviews.text: I like the brand. I like how the boots look with jeans and cords. BUT... they are heavy boots. If you are going to do some walking, wear a different pair of boots. They took about a week to break in. (They are true to size. I wear 7.5 and thats the size I bought. I have plenty of room for socks.)
customer_reviews.author: the teach

customer_reviews.title: Won't Disappoint, quality abound, made in USA!
customer_reviews.text: For the wife. Made in USA, quality throughout, durable, iconic. She has gotten several complements about them while out and about. Those with high end taste love them. Classic style and pretty badass.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: FRYE womens harness boot
customer_reviews.text: I love the boots. I did order a half size smaller than what I normally would wear, but almost wish I would have ordered my normal size as the boots fit great with thin socks, but I'm not sure I will be able to wear heavier, wool, winter socks with them. These boots look awesome. I bought them to wear as everyday boots around the horses, but I don't know that I want to do that now since they are so nice. I do feel that whatever I choose to do with them, they will last me a long time, as they appear to be very well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: horseloverof9

customer_reviews.title: i returned them
customer_reviews.text: too small in the leg width for me, too narrow in the foot width, and way too expensive , but i do love how they looked with the broken in two tone paint job. ended up with some men's 7 inch durango harness boots for 300 dollars less.
customer_reviews.author: globug

customer_reviews.title: A True Classic!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pair of boots! Classy and classic in style. Bought my last pair over 25 years ago & they've finally worn out! Delighted with their new replacements! Very comfortable; only a little breaking in period needed. Very true to size (ordered womens 8.5 - medium width. Appear to be as good quality as I remembered a couple decades ago, although they cost more than twice the price of my original pair! Would highly recommend Frye brand boots!
customer_reviews.author: Renesanz

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Boot
customer_reviews.text: This boot fit as expected. i usually wear an 8 and this boot fits with a thick sock or more loosely with a thin. i wouldn't go half size down as i have read on other reviews of this boot as it narrows in the toe. Fabulous quality leather and looks great with dresses or skinny jeans. Made in USA, which makes me so happy.
customer_reviews.author: book mama

customer_reviews.title: Luv my 12Rs
customer_reviews.text: Fit was perfect but.....Boots had multiple imperfections. Stitching was off. Labels sewn haphazardly. From to shoea did match up. But seller was quick responding when requesting return. Anyhoo ended up getting new pair from.besties for birthday!
customer_reviews.author: BEJEAN

customer_reviews.title: Love my Fryes!
customer_reviews.text: I had tried boots on in a store previous to ordering them online. Fryes are known to fit large... Sizing down worked for me. Usually take 5 1/2 to 6... Ordered 5 1/2 and I will have enough room to wear heavier socks. The fit is snug right now... I'm told the leather will stretch with wear. Love the boots!
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Dedmon

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipment, nice boots, a little snug
customer_reviews.text: Took advice of previous reviewers and ordered 1/2 size smaller. They are a snug fit - will not be able to wear the heavier boot socks with them, which I like with boots. Shipping and delivery were lightening fast. Boots are great but will darken them with Bear Grease leather dressing, which will also soften them so hopefully they stretch out a little faster.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: These boots are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. My 3rd pair of Frye boots. First pair of harness boots.
customer_reviews.author: Wlc68

customer_reviews.title: Damaged out of the box
customer_reviews.text: One boot was clearly not matched to the other with significant wear, and one pull was unsewn. Very disappointed. Waiting for the replacements now. Will review again after they arrive.
customer_reviews.author: brianwujcik

product_meta.title: Frye Women's Harness 12R Boot
product_meta.description:
A squared toe and brushed-metal harness detail lend rough-and-ready charm to this supple leather boot.

The Harness boot from Frye is a classic with some seriously rugged character. The quality leather complements the look of its timeless shape, while the studded leather strap at the ankle provides a hint of urban style.

The Frye Company is the oldest continuously operated shoe company in the United States. Founded in 1863 by John A. Frye, a well-to-do shoemaker from England, and family-run until 1945, Frye products have a long and illustrious history. Frye boots were worn by soldiers on both sides of America's Civil War, soldiers in the Spanish-American war, and by Teddy Roosevelt and his Rough Riders. When home-steading drew adventurous New England families to the West during the mid and late 1800's many of the pioneers wore Frye Boots for the long journey. Today Frye remains true to its roots with its line of heritage boots, but continues to innovate as it introduces chic new handbags, pumps, and sandals to its collection.

See more
